statements: UPDATE trade_execution_optimization SET trade_price = 1000.50, trade_timestamp = '2022-05-15 12:30:00' WHERE trade_id = 101;
UPDATE trade_execution_optimization SET trade_symbol = 'AAPL', trade_volume = 500 WHERE trade_id = 205;
UPDATE trade_execution_optimization SET trade_price = 1500.75, trade_volume = 100 WHERE trade_id = 100 AND trade_symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE trade_execution_optimization SET trade_timestamp = '2022-06-30 14:30:00', trade_type = 'Buy' WHERE trade_id = 200 AND trade_symbol = 'GOOGL';
UPDATE Trades SET executed_price = 100.50 WHERE trade_id = 1;
UPDATE Orders SET order_quantity = 50, order_status = 'Filled' WHERE order_id = 3;
UPDATE Trades SET executed_price = 25.75, trade_quantity = 100 WHERE trade_id = 1234;
UPDATE Orders SET order_quantity = 75, order_status = 'COMPLETE' WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND order_type = 'LIMIT';
UPDATE trade_orders SET quantity = 100, price = 10.5 WHERE order_id = 12345;
UPDATE trade_executions SET execution_price = 12.75, executed_time = '2022-01-20 14:30:00' WHERE execution_id = 54321;
UPDATE trade_orders SET quantity = 100, executed = true WHERE order_id = 1234;
UPDATE trade_history SET trade_result = 'SUCCESS', trade_date = '2022-04-15' WHERE transaction_id = 5678;

UPDATE orders SET order_price = 2000.00, side = 'SELL' WHERE order_id = 10;

UPDATE orders SET order_status = 'FILLED' WHERE order_id = 10;
